title: Handling Business Competition & Influencer Marketing Tips | #AskGaryVee Episode 208
description:
#QOTD: The whole "live" experience (Periscope, Facebook)- what's your early take on it? What do you like? What do you not like? Are you watching anything? I want your 2 sentence thesis on the live revolution.
